CustomField.description: Checking out Same Day Cancellation option will provide with behavior where cancellation will be done on same day, unchecking it will mean Cancellation will be using cancel day + 1 behavior.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checking out Same Day Cancellation option will provide with behavior where cancellation will be done on same day, unchecking it will mean Cancellation will be using cancel day + 1 behavior.
CustomField.label: Same Day Cancellation
